opensesame1000 wrote:

>hi all.,
>
>I am a new user to junit. I recently installed the Junit 3.7 against 
>jdk 1.4
>
>After setting classpath and running the sample test this is the error 
>i get...
>
>C:\Junit>java junit.textui.TestRunner junit.samples.AllTests
>.........................................
>.........................................
>.......E.
>Time: 1.913
>There was 1 error:
>1) testClassLoading(junit.tests.TestCaseClassLoaderTest)
>java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: junit.tests.ClassLoaderTest
>

This problem is addressed in the JUnit FAQ.  Refer to the CLASSPATH note 
in Step #4.

    http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm#started_2

Mike
